permissions: Admin users can update. Non-admin users must be manager members of the broker associated with the organization.
side_effects: Updates the project transport organization and may update the external TMS master company identification.
validation_notes: Requires a project transport organization ID argument. Must specify at least one of --name or --external-tms-master-company-id. Name must be present and unique per broker when provided.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: Must be present; unique per broker when provided.

flags.name: --external-tms-master-company-id
flags.description: External TMS master company identifier. Example: --external-tms-master-company-id "TMS-002".
